headline: Why Even High-Quality Financial Stocks American Express, Blackstone, and Ally Financial Plunged Today
summary: The across-the-board declines were likely due to angst over President Donald Trump's morning social media post regarding Federal Reserve Chairman Jay Powell, which some investors took as a threat to the Fed's independence.  On top of this, China sent out a new threat to countries potentially making trade deals with the U.S., which could complicate the process for getting deals done.
